title: 64. U NI NDZHWALO MBILWINI YA WENA?

lines: 1. U Ni Ndzhwalo Mbilwini Ya Wena? Tivisa Yesu Tivisa Yesu,
U Pfumala Ku Rhula Moyeni, Tivisa Yesu Sweswi.
Tivisa Yesu Tivisa Yesu I Munghana Lonene,
A Ku Na Un’wana Nakulorhi, Tivisa Yesu Ntsena.
2. Miringweni Leyi Chavisaka, Tivisa Yesu Tivisa Yesu,
Na Loko U Wele Vudyohweni, Tivisa Yesu Ntsena.
3. N’wi Vikele Milandzu Ya Wena, Tivisa Yesu Tivisa Yesu,
U Kanakana Hi Swa Mundzuku, Tivisa Yesu Ntsena.
4. Rifu Ri Ku Handzula Mapfalo, Tivisa Yesu Tivisa Yesu,
U Navela Ku Vuya Ka Kreste, Tivisa Yesu Ntsena.
